EmailTemplate.name: Network Partner Do Not Reply
EmailTemplate.subject: Do Not Reply : Case Closed :{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Closed
Dear Sender,
Your Case No {!Case.CaseNumber} is in Closed status.
Please direct any new requests or inquiries on a new email to Network Partners Query Management and Support team on businesspartner@auspost.com.au.
Kind regards, Network Partners Query Management and Support team {!Case.Thread_Id}
